channel.title: How to get npc's to drop items on mezzyscape server?

item.title: How to get npc's to drop items on mezzyscape server?
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

under

public static int randomKbd[] = {11284, 4587, 11732, 536};

public static int getKbdDrop() {
return randomKbd[(int)(Math.random()*randomKbd.length)];
}

add this

public static int randomKbd[] = {11284, 4587, 11732, 536};

public static int getKbdDrop() {
return randomKbd[(int)(Math.random()*randomKbd.length)];
}

add this

public static int random@@@@[] = {####, ####, ####, ####};

public static int get@@@@Drop() {
return random@@@[(int)(Math.random()*random@@@.length)];
}

change @@@@ to one name like blkDrag or something
and change #### to item ids

say i want it to drop an rune scim,gp, and bones
but item2.java wont really work that way itll drop 1 item at an time

if you still dont get itâ€¦want me to make an tut about it?

item.title: How to get npc's to drop items on mezzyscape server?
item.dc:creator: @runeaddictz runeaddictz
item.description:
@runeaddictz wrote:

i want the black drags to drop rares like phats and mask how i do that because when i go to npc drops it comes up with the npc id thn shows these numbers beside it like this
public static int randomKbd[] = {11284, 4587, 11732, 536};

public static int getKbdDrop() {
	return randomKbd[(int)(Math.random()*randomKbd.length)];
}
public static int randomKalphite[] = {536, 11284, 7158, 11732, 1187, 1377, 3140, 11335, 1305, 1434, 4087, 4585, };

public static int getKalphiteDrop() {
	return randomKalphite[(int)(Math.random()*randomKalphite.length)];

which one should i edit??

i also wanna edit spawns so that d claws can only be spawned by owners plz help
